content: लघुता, --त्वं {@--1@} Lightness, levity. {@--2@} Smallness, littleness. {@--3@} ({%a%}) Insignificance, unimportance, contempt, absence of dignity; इंद्रोऽपि लघुतां याति स्वयं प्रख्यापितैर्गुणैः. ({%b%}) Obscurity of birth, humbleness of origin. {@--4@} Dishonour, disrespect; <ls>Pt. 1. 140</ls>, <ls n="Pt. 1.">353.</ls> {@--5@} Activity, quickness. {@--6@} Shortness, brevity. {@--7@} Ease, facility. {@--8@} Thoughtlessness, frivolity. {@--9@} Wantonness.
